newsitem.title: GERMANY: BGB Finance issues 300 mln dmk 5-yr notes-leads.
newsitem.headline: BGB Finance issues 300 mln dmk 5-yr notes-leads.

text.p: BGB Finance (Ireland) plc, guaranteed by Bankgesellschaft Berlin AG, Berliner Bank AG and Landesbank Berlin-Girozentrale, has launched a 300 million mark issue of exchangeable notes due December 3, 2001, according to joint bookrunners and lead managers Bankgesellschaft Berlin AG and Goldman Sachs.

The Indicated coupon is 3.00 to 3.25 percent (annual). Exchange period is December 3, 1996 to November 19, 2001. The notes are issued and redeemed at par. The indicated initial exchange premium is 18-20 percent over Metro share price. Cash settlement option for issuer is from December 3, 1998 to November 19, 2001.
Non-call for three years then callable at par subject to 130 percent provision.
